author: wmtan
body: In ROOT6 macros are processed by cling, rather than CINT. Over 500 CMSSW macros do not compile in ROOT6. Since that is too many macros to be fixed centrally, it was decided by David Lange to centrally fix only those 45 macros with compilation errors that have been modified since the switch over to git, since those are the ones most likely to be used. Only four of these 45 macros are in the ALCA L2 category. This pull request fixes them.
title: Macros need to compile in ROOT6 (ALCA)
